hsrt.mec.controldeveloper.util

Class Globals

  • java.lang.Object
    • hsrt.mec.controldeveloper.util.Globals

  • public final class Globals
extends Object
    Defines global constants which are used program wide.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int ATTEMPTS
      In case of connection lost, define how many attempts to reconnect shall be performed
      static String CAR_PREFIX_NAME
      Any rover will have a number attached to the prefix.
      static String DELEMITER
      Delemiter, which devides the command values representing speed, direction, etc. within one command.
      static boolean ISLOG
      true, if logging information shall be printed out on the console; false otherwise.
      static String ROVER_IPv4
      The car is acting like a server.
      static int STEPTIMER
      Time to pause the worker task in order to initialize the serial port.
      static int TCP_PORT
      The default port used by rover to listen for incoming connections.
      static int TIMEOUT
      Timeout in ms in which rover should send an response !!

    • Field Detail

      • DELEMITER

        public static final String DELEMITER
        Delemiter, which devides the command values representing speed, direction, etc. within one command.

        Defined value is: ";"
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • STEPTIMER

        public static final int STEPTIMER
        Time to pause the worker task in order to initialize the serial port.

        Defined value is: 5000
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ISLOG

        public static final boolean ISLOG
        true, if logging information shall be printed out on the console; false otherwise.

        Defined value is: false
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CAR_PREFIX_NAME

        public static final String CAR_PREFIX_NAME
        Any rover will have a number attached to the prefix. The name is with prefix hardcoded on car firmware and should be unique for each rover. This mean that in environments with multiple rovers suffix value will be incremented. E.g. LAB_ROVER_1, LAB_ROVER_2
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TCP_PORT

        public static final int TCP_PORT
        The default port used by rover to listen for incoming connections. This parameter is also hardcoded directly in car's firmware.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ROVER_IPv4

        public static final String ROVER_IPv4
        The car is acting like a server. It listen for incoming connections using port above and the IP address defined here. Also IP Address is hardcoded inside car firmware.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ATTEMPTS

        public static final int ATTEMPTS
        In case of connection lost, define how many attempts to reconnect shall be performed
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TIMEOUT

        public static final int TIMEOUT
        Timeout in ms in which rover should send an response !! Time out must be greater than the time required by direction command to execute a 90 degree rotation
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
